properties.areaDesc: Potomac/Seeley Lake Region; Lower Clark Fork Region
properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 12 at 6:11AM MST until February 12 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Missoula MT
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches.
Heavier bursts of snow associated with snow bands could create
brief periods of near zero visibility and rapidly degrading
travel conditions.

* WHERE...Evaro Hill, Highway 200 Thompson Falls to Plains,
Highway 200 Trout Creek to Heron, I-90 Lookout Pass to Haugan,
Highway 200 Bonner to Greenough, Highway 83 Seeley Lake to
Condon, and I-90 East Missoula to Bearmouth.

* WHEN...Until 11 AM MST this morning.

* IMPACTS...Travel could be affected.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST THIS MORNING
